duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop strategically focused content plans for social, digital, email, and web content, actionable and measurable against client objectives.
Lead content brainstorm sessions, manage deliverables on all assigned accounts, and outline content execution needs.
Write and edit content, ensuring it is clear, compelling, and properly distributed across all platforms.
Analyze data and make strategic recommendations, as well as present findings and recommendations to the client on a regular basis.
Manage the workload and development of assigned Content Coordinators, overseeing content strategy deliverables.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s Degree in related field preferred (Strategic Communications, Advertising, Journalism, Marketing, Design or Public Relations)
